targets.query:
from(bucket: "${Process_Bucket}" )
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ElectricalMeasurement")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["SensorName"] == "BC1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "CurrentAssymetry")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 10ms, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  //|> yield(name: "raw")
  |> movingAverage(n: 10)
  |> yield(name: "avarage")

from(bucket: "${Process_Bucket}" )
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ElectricalMeasurement")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["SensorName"] == "BC1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "L1_Current" or  r["_field"] == "L2_Current" or r["_field"] == "L3_Current")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 10ms, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  //|> yield(name:"mean")

from(bucket: "${Process_Bucket}" )
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ElectricalMeasurement")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["SensorName"] == "BC1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "L1_CurrIntegral" or r["_field"] == "L2_CurrIntegral" or r["_field"] == "L3_CurrIntegral" )

panels.title: Anomaly ratio - Current Integral Phase L1
Anomaly ratio - Current Integral Phase L2
Anomaly ratio - Current Integral Phase L3

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${Process_Bucket}" )
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ElectricalMeasurement" and r.SensorName == "BC1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "L1_CurrIntegral_AnomalyRatio"  ) 
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")

  |> map (fn: (r) =>  ( { r with anomalyPercent: r.L1_CurrIntegral_AnomalyRatio * 100.0 } )  )
  |> drop(columns: ["L1_CurrIntegral_AnomalyRatio"])

from(bucket: "${Process_Bucket}" )
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ElectricalMeasurement" and r.SensorName == "BC1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "L2_CurrIntegral_AnomalyRatio" ) 
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")

  |> map (fn: (r) =>  ( { r with anomalyPercent: r.L2_CurrIntegral_AnomalyRatio * 100.0 } )  )
  |> drop(columns: ["L2_CurrIntegral_AnomalyRatio"])

from(bucket: "${Process_Bucket}" )
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ElectricalMeasurement" and r.SensorName == "BC1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "L3_CurrIntegral_AnomalyRatio" ) 
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")

  |> map (fn: (r) =>  ( { r with anomalyPercent: r.L3_CurrIntegral_AnomalyRatio * 100.0 } )  )
  |> drop(columns: ["L3_CurrIntegral_AnomalyRatio"])

from(bucket: "${Process_Bucket}" )
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ElectricalMeasurement")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["SensorName"] == "BC1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "L1_InrushCurr" or r["_field"] == "L2_InrushCurr" or r["_field"] == "L3_InrushCurr" )
